channel.title: Code Chunk on
channel.description: Recent content in Code Chunk on

item.title: Knitr Code Chunk Labeling Issues
item.description: When using Rmarkdown, we are recommended to assign to each code chunk an unique label that only contains alphanumeric characters (a-z, A-Z, 0-9), slashes (/), or dashes (-). I never had taken the recommendation in serious consideration until I noticed that the string “unnamed_code_chunk” appeared in each theorem environment in the output pdf file. The reason that the string appears is because the underscore “_” is a special character in LaTeX.
